import React from 'react'; import Reveal from "react-reveal/Reveal"; import ChilliChatka from '../../../assets/chillichatka.jpg'; import style from './homepage.scss'; const Homepage = (props) => { return ( <>

Dear Amisha Gyani

Before you go ahead, I want you to think of the best moment in your life. Aage mat badh, pehle soch ki konsa moment hai that is your definition of happiness. Socha? Pakka soch liya? Am I a part of that moment? Now the reason I asked you to do this is because, I promise you ki I will always keep you this much happy. I love you so much that I want to make your every day more memorable than the previous one. This gift is just one of my effort in this direction. I hope you like. I love you!
) } export default Homepage;
